var createScoreCalcSystem=function createScoreCalcSystem(){return{update:function update(delta,worldState,extra){if(worldState.correctCatch){worldState.correctCatch=false;worldState.score+=100;if(worldState.score%1000===0){worldState.difficulty+=1;}}}};};export default createScoreCalcSystem;
